definition: To have objective reality or to be present in the world, often used to describe the state of being or the act of being alive or in existence.

examples.german: Es gibt viele Theorien darüber, wie das Universum entstanden ist.
examples.english: There are many theories about how the universe came into existence.

examples.german: Die alten Ruinen existieren noch immer.
Die Möglichkeit einer Parallelwelt wird diskutiert.
examples.english: The possibility of a parallel world is being discussed.
